attributes.review: I downloaded this app with high expectations but as soon as I logged in it was showing images of uncooked eggs. I exited out thinking it was a glitch but now about every 5 mins (even after I deleted the app and restarted my phone) an image of an uncooked egg pops up on the right corner of my screen. Thanks a lot.

attributes.review: i downloaded this app with the hopes of cheeto bunker boy telling me jokes when i prompt him. instead what I got was a shameful pile of garbage. this app made my cat throw up which caused me to have to buy a new rug. my shoes were running after me on my way to delete this terrible awful horrible app. take this down for the safety of all consumers

attributes.review: If I could give this app 0 stars I would. It would always glitch out and shut down. I would receive WAY to many notifications, often the same ones spammed to me. I worried it was infringing on the well-being of my phone. I deleted it IMMEDIATELY. I hope the App Store does too.
